hackathon-description-text: HackPoly '16 is Cal Poly Pomona's 3rd annual software/hardware hackathon.

Senior Software Engineer at Jib Jab Studios
Director at McNair Scholars Program at Cal Poly Pomona

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best use of the Ticketmaster API

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=College of Education & Integrative Studies, 3801 W Temple Ave, Pomona, CA 91768, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: This is very difficult to describe, but you'll know it when you see it. The closest description would be a project that makes you feel like you are living in the future.

How difficult was the project to implement technically in the time frame? Is the hack technically interesting or difficult? Is it just some lipstick on an API, or were there real technical challenges to surmount?
Is the hack practical given its target audience? Is it something that the user base would actually use? Does it fulfill a need people have?
Did the participant(s) sell the product well? Was the idea clearly defined and the pitch convincing?

hackathon-location-address: College of Education & Integrative Studies, 3801 W Temple Ave, Pomona, CA 91768, USA
hackathon-description-header: The 24 hour intercollegiate hackathon at Cal Poly Pomona for creativity, ingenuity, and technical talent.
